sentences.english: Nothing can keep us from walking off the livelong night.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么能阻拦我们走出这漫漫长夜。

sentences.english: And life's long night is ended, and he way Lies open onward to eternal day.
sentences.chinese: 生命的漫漫长夜已尽，大路开展，奔向永恒的白日。

sentences.english: Will I found you and make it through the night?
sentences.chinese: 我会找到你并且熬过漫漫长夜吗？

sentences.english: Through the long nights of angry weather.
sentences.chinese: 在狂风暴雨的漫漫长夜中。

sentences.english: They and their teams stayed with us through the long night.
sentences.chinese: 他们和他们的团队同我们一起熬过这漫漫长夜。

sentences.english: It came as a joyous daybreak to end the long light of captivity.
sentences.chinese: 恰似结束漫漫长夜禁锢的欢畅黎明。

sentences.english: My heavy eyelids to the weary night?
sentences.chinese: 使我在这漫漫长夜里目不交睫？

sentences.english: Ive never seen a night so long when time goes crawling by.
sentences.chinese: 我没有见过如此漫漫长夜，时间缓缓如虫爬行而过。

sentences.english: How will I walk alone in the long night?
sentences.chinese: 又怎会让我在漫漫长夜独自徘徊？

sentences.english: He only had long night in which to study.
sentences.chinese: 他只有漫漫长夜可以用来学习。

sentences.english: Only through the long night the only ones who best understand the valuable sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 只有度过漫漫长夜的人，才最懂得阳光的可贵。

sentences.english: She sat beside her husband through the livelong night.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在她丈夫的身边度过一个漫漫长夜。

sentences.english: I turned and tossed ceaselessly through the long sticky night.
sentences.chinese: 漫漫长夜，湿热难熬，辗转反侧，无法入眠。

sentences.english: It's gonna be a long night of reading.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个要看不少资料的漫漫长夜。

sentences.english: Tang concluded that the child's life snake in the long night.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子结束了腾蛇的一生中的漫漫长夜。

sentences.english: And I know everybody had a long night.
sentences.chinese: 我知道每个人都度过了漫漫长夜。

definition: long dark night/fig. long period of misery and oppression
the still of the night (idiom)/late at night
to toss and turn restlessly (in the bed)
lit. bleak wind and icy rain (idiom)/fig. hardships/miserable circumstances
